title: A comparative study of modern tragic heroes in Arthur Miller's death of a Salesman and all my sons and Henrik Ibsen the pillars of society and John Gabriel Borkman
contributors: Jenny Mochtar Djundjung (Examination Committee 1); Sarah Limuil (Advisor 1); Liliek Soelistyo (Advisor 2)
subjects: IBSEN, HENRIK, 1828-1906, THE PILLARS OF SOCIETY-SHEDY AND TEACHING; MILLER, ARTHUR, 1915-2005, DEATH OF A SALESMAN-STUDY AND TEACHING
